text: have you ever felt a strong desire
towards somebody all the signs of sexual
tension are there butterflies won't
leave your stomach your cheeks flush a
deep shade of red and you're suddenly
hot like it's the middle of the
Heatwave but there's a catch the person
you're so irresistibly drawn to is Out
Of Reach as some of you commented on our
video on sexual tension sometimes you
simply can't do anything about about it
for example you might be drawn to your
work colleague a professor best friend
who might not see you the same way or
you might already be in a relationship
with someone else or vice
versa so how do you keep your cool when
sexual tension is heating up the room we
made this video to give you some
strategies you can use to cope also this
topic is often taboo and we want to
bring it to light so let's dive
in number one welcome the
feelings have you ever tried to Simply
push your sexual thoughts away if you
have you might have noticed that it
didn't really work think of it like the
don't think of a pink elephant effect
trying not to think about it makes you
think about it more Instead try to
Simply accept your thoughts as they are
acceptance is a strategy rooted in
mindfulness and it involves
acknowledging sexual desires without
trying to suppress or control them it
means saying to yourself okay I'm
feeling this right now and that's fine I
don't need to act on it or judge myself
this way you can reduce the struggle
with urges and build emotional tolerance
by simply allowing the feeling to exist
without overreacting it eventually Fades
on its own
two attention
getaway if acceptance isn't your go-to
you can try distraction instead there's
a theory in Psychology called cognitive
load Theory which tells us that our
brains have a limited processing
capacity kind of like a computer running
too many
programs by filling your mind with other
tasks there is less mental space left
for sexual thoughts
for example if you find yourself
daydreaming about someone
inappropriately you could throw yourself
into a project at work start reading
something that requires Focus or play a
challenging game on your phone the
mental effort needed to concentrate will
leave less room for those distracting
thoughts three changing the
lenses to reduce your sexual urges you
could also try something called
Situation focused
reappraisal this means reframing the way
you interpret a specific
situation when you're feeling sexual
tension it often comes from focusing on
a person's physical appearance or
attractiveness in this context to
reappraise the situation means knowingly
shifting your focus to their other
qualities so instead of getting caught
up in their irresistible looks you can
focus on their intelligence sense of
humor or professionalism by doing this
you change the way your brain sees the
situation making it less about sexual
attraction and more about other
qualities number four channeling the
energy another useful strategy to deal
with those urges is
sublimation the this means taking your
sexual energy and channeling it into
something
productive this idea comes from Freud
who suggested that when we can't or
shouldn't act on certain desires like
sexual ones we can turn that energy into
creativity work or Hobbies when you feel
your sexual urges are getting out of
control you might redirect that energy
into a passion project exercise or even
something creative like writing or
painting instead of being stuck in
sexual frustration you're turning that
energy into something positive and
constructive and number five back to the
present
moment sexual tension and urges can
sometimes make you feel anxious or
distracted especially if it's in a
setting where acting on it is not
appropriate grounding techniques can
help you get back to the present moment
and calm your mind one popular technique
is called 5 4 3 2 1 where you focus on
your senses to break the mental Loop you
name five things you can see four things
you can touch three things you can
hear two things you can smell and one
thing you can taste so if you're feeling
overwhelmed by sexual thoughts you might
ground Yourself by noticing the texture
of your clothes the sound of a fan or
the smell of coffee this helps shift
your attention back to the real world
and calm your anxiety or obsessive
thoughts these are some strategies that
might help you control your sexual urges
when they're unwanted or
inappropriate unfortunately not being
able to act on your desires can lead to
sexual frustration you can check out
this video to learn more about that we
would also love to hear how you navigate
sexual tension in your life share your
tips in the comments if you're
comfortable in the meantime we hope you
connect with someone who is available
and shares the same spark thanks for
watching and take care
